Chunk List

The chunkList component replaces touchlist.

You can optionally add a docBox class to chunkList or nest it inside a docBox, but it isn't necessary; chunkList should work regardless of context.

Classes:

.chunkList > .chunkList-row > .chunkList-chunk

Usage:

Each li within chunkList can be seen as a "row", and each chunkList-chunk is a padded chunk for content within the row.

There are no restrictions on how many or how few chunks you can put in a row.

In the spirit of using small, sharp tools, chunk list classes handle only basic element spacing, so use fix-flex to set the layout of multiple chunks within a row.

                <div class="chunkList-chunk ffbox-fix pintop">
                    <span href="#" class=" avatar avatar--person" style="background-image: url(http://photos4.meetupstatic.com/photos/member/5/a/2/thumb_109681442.jpeg);">
                        Person
                    </span>
                </div>
                <div class="chunkList-chunk ffbox-flex">
                    <h5>Member Name</h5>
                </div>
            </a>
        </li>
        <li class="chunkList-row">
            <a class="ffbox" href="#">
                <div class="chunkList-chunk ffbox-fix pintop">
                    <span href="#" class="chunk--fix avatar avatar--person" style="background-image: url(http://photos4.meetupstatic.com/photos/member/d/0/2/c/member_156833292.jpeg);">
                        Person
                    </span>
                </div>
                <div class="chunkList-chunk ffbox-flex">
                    <h5>Member Name</h5>
                    <p class="small">You're both members of <strong>The Super Cool Dio 2016 Meetup Group</strong> and 6 others</p>
                </div>
            </a>
        </li>
    </ul>
